Package Controller

Class ShowingsDatabaseController

Object
ShowingsDatabaseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseController
public class ShowingsDatabaseController extends Object implements DatabaseController
ShowingsDatabaseController is a controller class that is used to write and read from the showing text file.
Since:
2022-11-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Koh Ming En

    • addNewShowing

      public boolean addNewShowing(String movieTitle, String cineplexName, String cinemaName, String date, String movieType)
      This function adds a new showing to the database
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - name of movie
      cineplexName - name of cineplex
      cinemaName - name of cinema
      date - date of showing
      movieType - type of movie (2D, 3D, blockbuster)
      Returns:
      true if showing was added, false otherwise
